block.p: Baseball
Baseball
Major League Baseball

ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS -- Named Rod Allen minor-league coach and Bob Crawford media relations manager. Agreed to terms with Jose de Carmen Ortiz, catcher; Belvani Martinez and Aristides Reynoso, second basemen; Jose Lopez, third baseman; Gregori Valera, Rafael Moscot and Juan Bautista, shortstops; Andres Nunez, Jhensy Sandoval, Juan de JS Vargas and Antonio Guzman, outfielders; Edickson Ortiz Them, Miguel Frias Rodriguez, Vladimir Paredes, Francisco Jiminez, Edwin Trinidad, Miguel Aquino, Carlos Perez Mena, Jose Luis Valdez and Roberto Manzueta, pitchers.
American League
BOSTON RED SOX -- Signed Chuck Ricci, pitcher, to a minor-league contract.
National League
CHICAGO CUBS -- Agreed to terms with Dave Magadan, third baseman, on a one-year contract.
CINCINNATI REDS -- Traded David Wells, pitcher, to the Baltimore Orioles for Curtis Goodwin and Trovin Valdez, outfielders.
COLORADO ROCKIES-Agreed to terms with Armando Reynoso, pitcher.
Basketball National Basketball Association
DENVER NUGGETS -- Signed Reggie Slater, forward.
Football
National Football League
ARIZONA CARDINALS -- Fired Buddy Ryan, coach.
Hockey
National Hockey League
BUFFALO SABRES -- Recalled Martin Biron, goaltender, from Beauport of the QMJHL.
DALLAS STARS -- Placed Craig Ludwig, defensman, on the injured list. Recalled Pat MacLeod, defenseman, from Michigan of the IHL.
HARTFORD WHALERS -- Loaned Marek Malik, defenseman, to Springfield of the AHL.
NEW YORK ISLANDERS -- Recalled Niclas Andersson, left wing, from Utah of the IHL.
WASHINGTON CAPITALS -- Recalled Martin Gendron, right wing, from Portland of the AHL.
College
GEORGIA -- Named Jim Donnan football coach.
